NATIONAL EBALLOTING- QUICK START GUIDE  
 
This “quick start guide” covers the main features of the National eBalloting to help you get started.   
Note that a full User guide explaining all of the features of the application. References to the full User guide are shown on the top right hand corner of each 
page in this document.
